sentences.sentence: It was not the policy of the government to repatriate genuine refugees.
sentences.translation: 遣返真正的难民并不是政府的政策。

sentences.sentence: China could, of course, repatriate all the dollars its exporters earn by selling stuff to the U.S..
sentences.translation: 当然，中国可以将出口商们通过将商品挣来的美元都遣返回美国。

sentences.sentence: So maybe it's time to "repatriate" those industries that were off-shored years ago, along with their jobs.
sentences.translation: 因此，把那些几年前出境的产业，连同与它们一起出境的就业岗位“遣返回国”，也许需要时间。
